alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:59PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield and central Westchester Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glen Cove, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stamford, New Rochelle, White Plains, Port Chester, Greenwich, Harrison, Scarsdale, Hawthorne, Mamaroneck, Rye Brook, Briarcliff Manor, Pleasantville, Larchmont, Hartsdale and Elmsford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
